name: swipelistview
description: A swipeable list view component for React Native using react-native-swipe-list-view.

data.name: data
data.description: Array of items to render in the list.

renderItem.name: renderItem
renderItem.description: Function to render each visible item.

renderHiddenItem.name: renderHiddenItem
renderHiddenItem.description: Function to render hidden item (shown on swipe).

onRowOpen.name: onRowOpen
onRowOpen.description: Callback when a row is swiped open.

keyExtractor.name: keyExtractor
keyExtractor.description: Function to extract unique key for each item.

style.name: style
style.description: Custom style for the list container.
